title: Discussion and Presentation-Based Communication Skills Development for Electrical Engineering Majors

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic electrical engineering concepts and ability to write simple reports
context.additional_context: Pre-service/in-service teachers focus on practical communication scenarios in electrical engineering, performing field-oriented role-playing via VR simulations.

learning_goals: Learners can design structured 3-minute presentations on electrical engineering topics
Learners can provide systematic feedback evaluating technical logic and delivery methods in peers' presentations
Learners can apply effective communication strategies while collaborating with team members to solve complex technical problems in VR simulation environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
